document.full_text: the sister of exiled former premier thaksin shinawatra was named the prime ministerial candidate for thailand's biggest opposition party on monday, a move seen as a high-stakes gamble ahead of a crucial july general election.
document.title: thai opposition opts for thaksin's sister as pm candidate
lines_and_colors: the sister of exiled former premier thaksin shinawatra was named the prime ministerial candidate for thailand's biggest opposition party on monday, a move seen as a high-stakes gamble ahead of a crucial july general election.
